value.title: Let's Talk Paginated Reports In Power BI (Premium)
value.excerpt: Join us live as we talk about where Paginated Reports in Power BI fit in. There is a place for paginated reports and you may not be aware of it!  游닉 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level? value.title: Link from a Power BI Paginated report to a Power BI report

value.title: Making sense of the Power BI Premium Gen2 Metrics App

Some great stuff in the latest update!  Install the Gen2 metrics app https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-bi/admin/service-premium-install-gen2-app

value.title: Mark as Date Table in Power BI Desktop is here!
value.excerpt: Mark as Date Table in Power BI Desktop is finally here! In this video, Patrick takes what Adam did with a custom date table and shows you how you can use Mark as Date Table in Power BI Desktop. This feature was introduced in the February 2018 release of Power BI Desktop. Mark as Date Table has been available

value.title: Natives Queries or ODBC with Incremental Refresh in Power BI
value.excerpt: Are you wanting to use Incremental Refresh in Power BI but need to use ODBC, native queries or something that doesn't fold properly? Adam shows you a solution for Power BI Desktop and Power BI dataflows!  Native Queries https://docs.microsoft.com/power-query/native-database-query  Using Incremental Refresh

value.title: Power BI and Microsoft Flow - Monitoring your data
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows how you can use Microsoft Flow, combined with Power BI, to monitor data and alert you when something is available.  This takes advantage of a streaming dataset and using the schedule recurrence in Microsoft Flow to trigger an action as Patrick wasn't using anything else to

value.title: Power BI Desktop And Role-Playing Dimensions: Can you do it?

Patrick shows you why one particular way is not recommended as it will cause trouble. And then show you how you can use DAX within Power BI Desktop to take this to the next level.

value.title: Power BI for report consumers and end users (2021)
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at Power BI for report consumers, or end users. Those folks that maybe don't author reports, but just view reports within Power BI. We introduce some basic Power BI concepts and introduce you to areas of the Power BI service to get you familiar with the portal.  游닉 Become a member:

value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

Original Quick Measure video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjSKCZtiNlI  Alberto's article - https://www.sqlbi.com/blog/alberto/2018/12/20/displaying-a-list-of-selected-months/
